places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Baghal Valley
address: Bakhalag-Arki Road, Teh, Arki, Khali, Himachal Pradesh 173208, India

reviews.text: Wonderful place located in scenic beauty full of nature. I wish to visit again very soon. Food was great and hospitality was superb 👌

My stay was extremely comfortable .The rooms were clean, very comfortable, and the staff was amazing. Excellent view from the hotel .Amazing wines, food and service, staff are extremely knowledgeable and make great recommendations.
It was great stay here rooms were very clean and spacious, view from the room balcony was just awesome and loved the food we had here also the staff was very good.
The hotel and its room is so pretty and beautiful also Great Staff and so humble in nature. They also guide me about the routes. I want to visit this hotel again and again.
The stay was amazing with a picturesque view. Also the staff was quite cooperative and the services rendered were top notch!

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Palace View

reviews.text: Very good and suitable trip for the location and hotel room and meal very good trip very awesome

Location and property is good 👍
Need improvement in services.
Quality of food good with average taste.

Overcharging guests - at first they will ask for 2000/room but if you walk away they will even come down to 1200. They think of guest as a milk cow, taking advantage of them as there aren't any more hotel in Arki.

Food is alright.... So is the service. The ambience is like regular Indian homes. Quite dull to be precise. I just used their restaurant. Nothing extraordinary. But since this is the only place in Arki to have food outside, giving one extra star than it deserved.
It's good service and good staff food is fantastic highen kitchen

places_with_reviews.name: Roti mojo hotel

reviews.text:
Tranquil Stopover on the Way to Manali

I recently spent a night in Shimla on my way to Manali, and it turned out to be a delightful experience. The location is conveniently situated en route to Manali, making it an ideal stopover.

The peaceful ambiance of the place was a breath of fresh air. The staff members were incredibly welcoming and hospitable, adding a personal touch to the stay. Their attentiveness and friendliness made the experience even more memorable.

The food served was not only delicious but also reflected the local flavors. It was a culinary delight that enhanced my overall satisfaction. The accommodation provided was comfortable and well-maintained, ensuring a restful night's sleep.
my last night in Shimla was a pleasant surprise, and I would highly recommend this place to fellow travelers. It made my journey to Manali even more enjoyable, leaving me with fond memories of a peaceful stopover.
Good place for tea coffee lunch brackfast dinar or night stay
In my 5 days trip first time I had my excellent dinner.  Must visit … on the way to shalaghat 👌👌👌👌
Very very tasty foid
Food is very good 😋
